Package mireka.smtp

Contains some commonly useful SMTP related classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MailSystemStatus This interface represents an SMTP status, which is returned by a remote MTA in a response, or generated locally.
 

Class Summary
ClientFactory ClientFactory creates SmartClient instances based on the configured parameters.
EnhancedStatus These class represents an SMTP status which includes enhanced status code.
SmtpReplyTemplate A template for an SMTP reply to be sent.
 

Enum Summary
EnhancedStatus.StatusClass  
 

Exception Summary
RejectExceptionExt Indicates that the SMTP command just received from a client must be rejected.
UnknownUserException Signals that the mailbox specified in the just received SMTP RCPT TO command is unknown, so the command must be rejected.
 

Package mireka.smtp Description

Contains some commonly useful SMTP related classes.
